column4: could somebody explain why fullscreen videos over GooTube work on my friends computer, but not the other 3 computers running Edgy that I own??
maybe you don't have flash installed
i wouldn't be able to see the videos period if it wasn't installed...it's just fullscreen that's the problem
All 3 of my computers won't display YouTube & Google Videos in fullscreen mode, but when i upgraded my buddy's computer to Edgy, his fullscreen button works!!  What gives??
